name: WombNoise
0:
”Alexa open Womb Noise”
”Alexa ask Womb Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: womb noise
des:
Womb Noise replicates the comforting sounds of the womb to help soothe you and promote sleep. The soft, rhythmic humming and heartbeat sounds provide a familiar auditory environment, aiding in relaxation and sleep.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Womb Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
